name: Space Match 3D
description:
We present you a dynamic game Space Match 3d. In it you need connect 3D rockets with each other to pass the level. Complicate the gameplay will be a timer, because your stock is not too much time.

On a large field is a huge variety of pairs, which you will need to find to connect to each other. And it all happens in space! For completing levels you will receive rewards in the form of new rockets and emotions gained through your skills and speed. 

Rewards can be viewed in the main menu, some of which will initially be closed. However, the longer you play, the more objects for matching will be available.

During the puzzle you will collect points, which are needed to evaluate your progress or to compete with your friends.

This game is best played during small breaks or to pass the time while waiting for something.

In addition to matching missiles, you can click on them on the main screen to blow them up and get points. It also features an excellent paralax space effect. 

This puzzle has a lot of colorful models and excellent space experience, so the game will not bore you for a long time. And future updates will bring a lot of new things to the game.
